Name: Turn
About the game: Turn is a meditative shape based puzzler that will put your logic, problem-solving and spatial awareness skills to the test; solve dozens of tricky puzzles by turning one shape into another with ingenious method. Gameplay Start by comparing the tools at your disposal against the puzzle shape, edges of the tools will glow when they align with an edge allowing you to feel your way around the solution. Once you have the perfect positioning use the tools to separate pieces of the orange shape which can then be moved, rotated and overlapped in order to recreate the puzzle shape and complete the level. Features A shape based puzzler like no other 40 challenging, handcrafted and named puzzles 4 unique tools to master 2+ hours of puzzle solving gameplay Peaceful soundtrack Minimalist art style Novel mechanics Contact Please feel free to get in touch if you have any questions, weâ€™d love you hear from you!
